title: AI Stock Analysis Competition
description: A machine learning model for stock market analysis and prediction, developed for a competitive challenge. Incorporates deep learning methods to analyze historical data and forecast market trends.

title: LINE Chatbot Lifestyle Assistant
description: An intelligent LINE chatbot that assists users with daily lifestyle management, including weather updates, appointment reminders, and personalized recommendations.

title: Online Data Visualization Helper
description: A web-based tool that transforms complex datasets into intuitive, interactive visualizations. Designed to help non-technical users understand and communicate data insights effectively.

title: Voice Diary
description: A privacy-focused voice journaling application that converts speech to text and organizes entries by date, mood, and custom tags. Includes sentiment analysis and reflective insights.

title: Badminton Visual Analysis
description: Computer vision system for badminton players to analyze their technique and performance. Tracks movements, identifies areas for improvement, and provides personalized coaching recommendations.
